titleStmt.title: The servant's audit: a sermon preached at the funerals of the right worshipful Sr. Edmund Anderson baronet, in the church of Broughton in the county of Lincoln, Febr. 15. 1660. / By Edward Boteler ... now rector of Wintringham in that county ...
titleStmt.author: Boteler, Edward, d. 1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Bedell & T. Collins, and are sold at their shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Title vignette: shield with three crosses.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
